, effective April 4. Eric Schmidt will continue on as executive chairman, while Sergey Brin will continue on as co-founder. blog post, Eric Schmidt said the shift has been in the works for some time. Larry, Sergey Brin , and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said. For 10 years, the trio have shared equally in the decision-making process, Eric Schmidt said, and going forward, they "will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us.
